alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 02 at 4:22AM PST until March 03 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW TO IMPACT MOUNTAIN PASSES... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 20 and 30 inches along the crest, including Stevens Pass. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 away in the high elevations east of the crest. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Stehekin, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions through tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible this afternoon and evening. Strong winds could cause life threatening conditions for folks in the back country.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
